entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 early this morning. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:43 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. Flurries beginning this evening. Local snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:43 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:43 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023
